videos.name: krugerspeech_00
videos.label: Kruger #01
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger instructs 'reformed' employees after they left juvenile.

videos.name: newscast_01
videos.label: Newscast #01
videos.description: The first newscast. Contains nothing relevant to the plot of the game, other than an early mention of "Reflection".

timestamps.38: OMNISTAT DE-ESCALATION TALKS AT A STALEMATE
timestamps.129: BRYSON SENIOR EXEC TO STEP DOWN
timestamps.163: REFLECTION - A STEP OR A LEAP FORWARD?

videos.name: krugerspeech_01
videos.label: Kruger #02
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger speaks about how great the upcoming "Reflection" technology is, and urges everyone to pre-order it.

videos.name: krugerspeech_02
videos.label: Kruger #03
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger speaks about the security and laws of the city, and what would happen if you were to defy them.

videos.name: newscast_02
videos.label: Newscast #02
videos.description: Aurore talks about the Bauble Mall that has just been destroyed in a bombing.

videos.name: blacknovember_01
videos.label: Rebecca #01
videos.description: Rebecca speaks in a distorted voice about Black November and threatens the general public and tells them what to do.

videos.name: krugerspeech_05
videos.label: Kruger #04
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger speaks about the bombing of the Bauble Mall, and that KrugerSec will fight back.

videos.name: blacknovember_02
videos.label: Rebecca #02
videos.description: Rebecca tries to convince the general public that they're being deceived by the Conglomerate.

videos.name: newscast_03
videos.label: Newscast #03
videos.description: Aurore reports Noah killed in the recent raid on Zephyr Transit Hub.

timestamps.108: REZONING DISTRICT MOVING INTO NEXT PHASE
timestamps.137: BRYSON INDUSTRIES TO CONSTRUCT A NEW MEGAFACTORY

videos.name: newscast_04
videos.label: Newscast #04
videos.description: Aurore reports the recent kidnapping of Isabel Kruger.

videos.name: blacknovember_03
videos.label: Rebecca #03
videos.description: Rebecca announces that they've kidnapped Isabel Kruger.

videos.name: krugerspeech_06
videos.label: Kruger #05
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger talks about his kidnapped daughter and threatens Rebecca Thane.

videos.name: newscast_05
videos.label: Newscast #05 (video N/A)
videos.description: Aurore reports about Isabel Kruger who was freed from captivity by KrugerSec.

timestamps.235: TRISHA MALUS HOSTS NEW ART EXHIBITION

videos.name: krugerspeech_03
videos.label: Kruger #06
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger comments on his daughter who was just freed from captivity.

videos.name: krugerspeech_04
videos.label: Kruger #07
videos.description: Gabriel Kruger advertises Reflection technology again, and points out how important it was in the rescuing of Isabel Kruger.

videos.name: newscast_06
videos.label: Newscast #06
videos.description: Aurore reports the recent bombing of The Shard.

videos.name: blacknovember_04
videos.label: Rebecca #04
videos.description: Rebecca comments about their bombing of The Shard.

videos.name: newscast_07
videos.label: Newscast #07
videos.description: Aurore reports Gabriel Kruger missing, and about his successor as CEO of KrugerSec, Isabel Kruger.

timestamps.31: ISABEL KRUGER NEW HEAD OF KRUGERSEC
timestamps.168: ISABEL KRUGER NEW HEAD OF KRUGERSEC, continued
